verdict.summary: Beef Stir Fry can be at risk for gluten contamination due to the use of soy sauce and potential cross-contamination in shared cooking equipment. Careful ingredient selection and preparation methods are essential for safety.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.
